name: “Soda Can Chronicles EPISODE 1”
description:
Attention!!! Read to play:
“Soda Can Chronicles EPISODE 1”
Interactive NFT cartoon series: read the story of episode 1 and participate in what happens in the next episode in comments.
🎤 SToRY: “Once upon a time a man landed on a parachute into the land of Hot Soda Drinks. The ground on which he stood was hot and his feet were burning. He started running up the mountains and suddenly saw some cool colors in the far. He took his binoculars and looked to verify what he was seeing. And indeed an oasis of cool land was laying in the distance…” 🎤continue the story by dropping your suggestion in the comments. The most interesting will be picked for illustration of the next episode
